choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here is a sample meal plan for you without dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews:

Monday:
- Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (e.g. broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini)
- Quinoa salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and lemon vinaigrette dressing

Tuesday:
- Tofu stir fry with mixed veggies (e.g. carrots, onions, bell peppers)
- Brown rice bowl with roasted sweet potato, black beans, avocado, and salsa

Wednesday:
- Grilled salmon with steamed broccoli and brown rice
- Lentil soup with mixed greens and a sprinkle of feta cheese

Thursday:
- Veggie wrap with hummus, roasted vegetables (e.g. lettuce, tomato, cucumber), and grilled chicken breast
- Quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, avocado, and lemon vinaigrette dressing

Friday:
- Grilled shrimp with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, avocado, and a balsamic glaze
- Chickpea curry with brown rice and steamed vegetables (e.g. carrots, potatoes)

Saturday:
- Grilled steak with roasted sweet potato and green beans
- Black bean soup with mixed greens and a sprinkle of feta cheese

Sunday:
- Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and brown rice
- Lentil and vegetable stir fry with mixed veggies (e.g. carrots, onions, bell peppers)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other dietary restrictions or preferences.
